head.title: Coronavirus Information – Coronavirus Information – Vallivue School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Vallivue School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Caldwell, ID.

link.script: var _gaq = _gaq || []; _gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-115209800-1']); _gaq.push(['_trackPageview']); (function() {var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true; ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js'; var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s); })();

span.style: text-decoration: underline
font-size: 24pt; color: #0000e0
span.a: The President's Coronavirus Guidelines For America

span.style: font-size: 14pt
color: #222222; font-family: 'Merriweather Sans', sans-serif; text-align: left

strong.span: The Idaho State Board of Education announced that

span.style: font-size: 14pt
color: #222222; font-family: 'Merriweather Sans', sans-serif; text-align: left

strong.span: all schools in the state of Idaho would be closed until April 20, 2020.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #333333; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: During this emergency closure of schools due to COVID-19, we hope your family is safe and healthy. We appreciate your patience and understanding as we navigate these uncharted waters and make adaptations to continue the educational process for all Vallivue students.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #333333; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: What Is Vallivue Doing during the pandemic?
